summary: This is an email correspondence from August 16, 2019, attaching a subpoena rider for the Epstein entity GREAT ST JIM LLC, which purchased parcels on Great St James Island in January 2016. The email also includes two deeds from the conveyances, and it is sent by a Senior Financial Investigator from Squad C-40 (FAST).

persons.name: Senior Financial Investigator (SFI)
persons.context: The sender of the email, likely from Squad C-40 (FAST), who is providing subpoena documents related to Epstein's entity GREAT ST JIM LLC.

events.title: Purchase of Great St James Island Parcels
events.description: The Epstein entity GREAT ST JIM LLC purchased parcels on Great St James Island.

events.title: Subpoena Rider Issued
events.description: A subpoena rider for GREAT ST JIM LLC is attached in an email, indicating ongoing financial investigation.

keyFacts: The Epstein entity GREAT ST JIM LLC purchased parcels on Great St James Island in January 2016.
A subpoena rider for GREAT ST JIM LLC was issued on August 16, 2019, as part of a financial investigation.
Two deeds from the conveyances were attached to the email, documenting the property purchases.
The correspondence involves Squad C-40 (FAST), indicating law enforcement's focus on Epstein's financial activities.
The document highlights the use of corporate entities (LLCs) for real estate acquisitions in the US Virgin Islands.
